1: I love the divine, my strength.
2: I trust steadfast strength and live secure, protected, and free.
3: I call on the praiseworthy One and stay safe.
4: Remain courageous and peaceful through overwhelming challenges.
5: Walk safely and live free beyond every snare.
6: I call, and my voice is heard.
7: Foundations shift, enabling renewal and justice to flourish.
8: Purifying fire kindles renewal and empowers strong action.
9: The divine comes close, and light prevails everywhere.
10: Help arrives swiftly, carried on the wings of the wind.
11: Protective mystery surrounds power, providing safe, peaceful shelter.
12: Radiant light clears heavy clouds and opens the sky
13: A powerful heavenly voice brings clarity and renewal.
14: Mighty light swiftly clears obstacles and opens the way.
15: Creative power reveals the world's hidden foundations.
16: Rescuing help lifts from many waters.
17: Powerful help secures victory over overwhelming challenges.
18: I stand strong, upheld by steadfast support.
19: Cherished people live free in wide open spaces
20: Integrity and clean conduct bring fair reward.
21: I stay faithful to the right path
22: I keep just principles before me and live by them.
23: I live with integrity and guard my conduct.
24: Integrity always receives fair and fitting reward.
25: Mercy invites mercy; integrity invites integrity
26: Acting with purity brings a matching pure response.
27: The humble thrive, and the proud grow into compassionate humility.
28: A guiding light illuminates every step.
29: With divine strength I overcome obstacles and surpass barriers.
30: Trust yields perfect, proven guidance and steadfast protection.
31: Rely on the unshakable rock for lasting stability.
32: I gain strength and my path becomes perfect.
33: Surefooted agility lifts you to the highest places.
34: Training builds strength for remarkable achievements.
35: Kindness lifts people into enduring greatness.
36: I walk a broad path with firm, steady footing.
37: Persist until full victory is achieved.
38: I stand firm and prevail with strength and enduring victory.
39: Strength equips for victory in every battle.
40: Strength enables mastery over obstacles and lasting success.
41: Wholehearted cries for help receive prompt, compassionate answers.
42: I advance; obstacles scatter like dust before the wind
43: I lead diverse nations, and they gladly follow and serve.
44: Good leadership inspires prompt cooperation from diverse communities.
45: Strangers become neighbors through open, welcoming communities
46: I exalt the rock of my salvation.
47: Justice prevails and unites people in lasting peace
48: I rise above all opposition and remain protected.
49: I give thanks and sing praise among all people.
50: Great victory and enduring mercy bless leaders and their descendants.
